name: DJ-1 Pastrami Overdrive
details: Simple overdriveOne of the first mini pedals by Danelectro, the Pastrami Overdrive is a simple to use, two knob overdrive pedal. Having no tone knob, the Pastrami definitely has a signature sound, often thought of as an ever so slightly higher gain Maxon 808. Powered by a 9 volt battery or 9 volt power supply.
